SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.RMI

Interface RMIServerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerRMI
public interface RMIServerInterface extends Remote
The RMIServerInterface interface defines the methods that are used for network communication in the game. These methods are called by the RMIServer class, which is the class that manages the network connections for client.

  • Method Details

    • loginAndIsFirst

      boolean loginAndIsFirst(RMIClientInterface clientRMI, String nickname) throws RemoteException, SameNameException, LobbyCompleteException, NoNameException
      This method is used to log in a client and check if it is the first player to login.
      Parameters:
      clientRMI - The client that is logging in.
      nickname - The nickname of the client that is logging in.
      Returns:
      True if the client is the first to login, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.
      SameNameException - throws a SameNameException if the nickname is already taken.
      LobbyCompleteException - throws a LobbyCompleteException if the lobby is already full or the game has already started.
      NoNameException - throws a NoNameException if the nickname is

    • lobbyIsReady

      boolean lobbyIsReady() throws RemoteException
      This method is used to check if the lobby is ready to start the game.
      Returns:
      True if the lobby is ready to start the game, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.

    • insertNumberOfPlayers

      void insertNumberOfPlayers(int numberOfPlayers) throws RemoteException, ClosingLobbyException, SameNameException, LobbyCompleteException, NoNameException
      This method is used to insert the number of players in the game.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - The number of players in the game. It must be between 2 and 4. Client interface will check this.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.
      ClosingLobbyException - throws a ClosingLobbyException if the lobby is closing.
      SameNameException - throws a SameNameException if two players have the same nickname.
      LobbyCompleteException - throws a LobbyCompleteException if the lobby is already full or the game has already started.
      NoNameException - throws a NoNameException if a player with the given nickname does not exist.

    • chooseColor

      void chooseColor(String nickname, Color color) throws RemoteException, ColorAlreadyTakenException, NoNameException
      This method is used to choose the color of the player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      color - The color chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.
      ColorAlreadyTakenException - throws a ColorAlreadyTakenException if the color is already taken by another player.
      NoNameException - throws a NoNameException if a player with the given nickname does not exist.

    • sendChatMessage

      void sendChatMessage(String message, String sender) throws RemoteException
      This method is used to send a chat message to the other players.
      Parameters:
      message - The message sent by the player.
      sender - The nickname of the player who sent the message.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.

    • chooseSideStartingCard

      void chooseSideStartingCard(String nickname, boolean side) throws RemoteException, WrongGamePhaseException, NoTurnException, NoNameException
      This method is used to choose the starting card of the player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      side - The side of the card chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.
      WrongGamePhaseException - throws a WrongGamePhaseException if the player is trying to choose the starting card in the wrong game phase.
      NoTurnException - throws a NoTurnException if the player is trying to choose the starting card when it is not his turn.
      NoNameException - throws a NoNameException if a player with the given nickname does not exist.

    • chooseSecretObjectiveCard

      void chooseSecretObjectiveCard(String nickname, int indexCard) throws RemoteException, WrongGamePhaseException, NoTurnException, NoNameException
      This method is used to choose the secret objective card of the player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      indexCard - The index of the secret objective card chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.
      WrongGamePhaseException - throws a WrongGamePhaseException if the player is trying to choose the secret objective card in the wrong game phase.
      NoTurnException - throws a NoTurnException if the player is trying to choose the secret objective card when it is not his turn.
      NoNameException - throws a NoNameException if a player with the given nickname does not exist.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(String nickname, int indexHand, Point position, boolean side) throws RemoteException, WrongGamePhaseException, NoTurnException, NotEnoughResourcesException, NoNameException, CardPositionException
      This method is used to place a card on the player's table.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      indexHand - The index of the card in the player's hand.
      position - The position where the card will be placed.
      side - The side of the card that will be placed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.
      WrongGamePhaseException - throws a WrongGamePhaseException if the player is trying to place a card in the wrong game phase.
      NoTurnException - throws a NoTurnException if the player is trying to place a card when it is not his turn.
      NotEnoughResourcesException - throws a NotEnoughResourcesException if the player does not have enough resources to place the card.
      NoNameException - throws a NoNameException if a player with the given nickname does not exist.
      CardPositionException - throws a CardPositionException if the player is trying to place a card in an invalid position.

    • drawCard

      Integer[] drawCard(String nickname, boolean gold, int onTableOrDeck) throws RemoteException, WrongGamePhaseException, NoTurnException, NoNameException, CardPositionException
      This method is used to draw a card from the deck.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player.
      gold - A boolean indicating whether the card is a gold card.
      onTableOrDeck - An integer indicating whether the card is on the table or deck. It is -1, to pick from deck, 0 or 1 to pick from table.
      Returns:
      The id of the card drawn by the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.
      WrongGamePhaseException - throws a WrongGamePhaseException if the player is trying to draw a card in the wrong game phase.
      NoTurnException - throws a NoTurnException if the player is trying to draw a card when it is not his turn.
      NoNameException - throws a NoNameException if a player with the given nickname does not exist.
      CardPositionException - throws a CardPositionException if the player

    • connectToServer

      void connectToServer() throws RemoteException
      This method is used to know if a client is connected to the server. The client will call this method to check if the connection is still active.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - throws a RemoteException if there is a problem with the connection.
